newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Asahimas Q1 net plunges to 420 mln rph.
newsitem.headline: Asahimas Q1 net plunges to 420 mln rph.

text.p: Indonesian glass maker PT Asahimas Flat Glass Co., Ltd. said on Wednesday it posted a net profit of 420 million rupiah in the first quarter of 1997 against 18.4 billion rupiah in the year-ago period.
Asahimas said in a statement the drop in net profit was due to weak glass prices. The firm, however, said prices were expected to firm up in the second-half of this year.
Asahimas posted net sales of 82.4 billion rupiah in the first quarter of 1997, or down 15.3 percent from the year-ago period, the statement said.
Asahimas is among the largest flat glass manufacturers in Indonesia. -- Jakarta newsroom +6221 384-6364
